Text: RE LetterThank you Rick I asked you by email instead of calling you since I know how very busy your schedule is at this time Jean Original Message From Shapiro Richard Sent Friday November PM To Dressler Jean Subject Re Letter Will do next week Rick S Original Message From Dressler Jean JeanR NRONcom To Shapiro Richard Richard NRONcom Sent Fri Nov Subject Letter Hi Rick During our conversation you offered to write a letter of recommendation I would like to ask if you could please do that for me It would be very much appreciated Thank you Jean Dressler
